skills.label: Create and manage a database
items: Use save object as, open, save and publish, compact and repair database, and encrypt with password commands, create a database from a template, and set access options

skills.label: Configure the Navigation pane
items: Rename objects, delete objects, and set navigation options

skills.label: Apply Application Parts
items: Use blank forms, quick start, and user templates

skills.label: Create tables
items: Create tables in design view

skills.label: Create and modify fields
items: Insert a field, delete a field, rename a field, hide or unhide fields, freeze or unfreeze fields, modify data types, modify the field description, and modify field properties

skills.label: Sort and filter records
items: Use find, sort, and filter commands

skills.label: Set relationships
items: Define primary keys, use primary keys to create relationships, and edit relationships

skills.label: Enter and format text
items: Use text effects
Change the indentation, alignment, line spacing, and direction of text
Change the formatting of bulleted and numbered lists
Enter text in a placeholder text box
Convert text to smartart
Copy and paste text
Use paste special, and use format painter

skills.label: Import data from a single data file
items: Import source data into a new table, append records to an existing table, and import data as a linked table

skills.label: Create forms
items: Use the form wizard, create a blank form, use form design tools, and create navigation forms

skills.label: Apply Form Design Tab options
items: Use the themes, controls, header/footer, and tools groups

skills.label: Apply Form Arrange Tab options
items: Use the table, move, and position groups

skills.label: Apply Form Format Tab options
items: Use the background and control formatting groups

skills.label: Construct queries
items: Use select, make table, append, and crosstab query types

skills.label: Manage source tables and relationships
items: Use the show table and remove table commands, and create ad hoc relationships

skills.label: Manipulate fields
items: Add, remove, and rearrange fields, and use sort and show options

skills.label: Calculate totals
items: Use the total row, and use group by

skills.label: Generate calculated fields
items: Perform calculations, use the zoom box, and use expression builder

skills.label: Create reports
items: Create a blank report, use report design tools, and use the report wizard

skills.label: Apply Report Design Tab options
items: Use the themes, grouping & totals, controls, header/footer, and tools groups

skills.label: Apply Report Arrange Tab options
items: Use the table, move, position, and sizing & ordering groups

skills.label: Apply Report Format Tab options
items: Add color, background images, and conditional formatting

skills.label: Apply Report Page Setup Tab options
items: This objective may include, but is not limited to, using the page size and page layout groups

skills.label: Sort and filter records for reporting
items: Use the find, sort, and filter commands, and use view types
